author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and created a sound design for this video of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, filmed in the 1930s. It captures the vibrant streets, daily life, and iconic landmarks of Rio. Step back in time and experience the city as never seen before.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

B&W Video Source: A/V Geeks

A heartfelt thank you to A/V Geeks for their incredible dedication to preserving archival footage. Please consider supporting their important work: https://ko-fi.com/avgeeks

title: Rio de Janeiro 1930s in color  [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
